extendedInfo.description: South Africa's Leading News App Featuring KwikJobs. You can now read Mzansi's leading news on your device and look for South African Micro Jobs that Pay!. Our app will provide you instant access to all the daily news, analysis, features and interviews you have come to expect from Mzansi. Get the latest and breaking news from the South African Media and its national network of journalists. Stories are arranged in categories including Mzansi News, Business, Sci-Tech and sport. The app offers stories and video. This free app lets you watch video reports, list your classifieds, view latest classifieds in your area  and read the latest updates wherever you are.Key features:â¢ Simple design with easy scrolling for efficient browsingâ¢ Tap to reveal full-screen article and in-story videoâ¢ Swipe through stories to browseâ¢ Post stories to social networks, or share via email and SMSâ¢ Get breaking news with a real-time headline tickerâ¢ Watch or listen to the latest news headlines*Also available in all countries outside of South Africa for users that may need to know what is happening in South Africa.South Africa's complete and up-to-date coverage of news in Mzansi on you mobile!
